page.title: 09CLUBS AND ENTERTAINMENT 01
page.content: Public Houses are one of the most popular places for entertainment in our area. People drink mainly beer. There are many different breweries who make the beer eg Ansells, M&B, Bathams, Simpkiss, Hansons and Banks's. Beer drinking is a great pastime. Games are played in pubs like darts, pool, snooker cards and dominoes. There may be a juke box for those who would rather listen to some music. Clubs such as Liberal, Labour and Conervative clubs are most suitable for young families. Most Saturday nights there is a disco or a group which are there to entertain. About halfway through the evening there will be a couple of rounds of bingo for money mad people. Then after that the disco or group will carry on. The bar would usually close at about 11.30 pm.
